          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnesium  burning in chlorine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnesium, das im Chlor brennt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Magnésium brûlant en chlore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Magnésio que queima-se no cloro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Magnesio che si brucia in cloro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάψιμο μαγνήσιου στο χλώριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Magnesio que se quema en clorina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows magnesium metal strip reacting with chlorine gas to make magnesium chloride.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal strip</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den 
Magnesiummetallstreifen, der mit Chlorgas reagiert, um 
Magnesiumchlorverbindung zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la bande en métal de 
magnésium réagissant avec le gaz de chlore pour préparer le 
chlorure de magnésium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a tira do metal do 
magnésio que reage com o gás do cloro para fazer o cloreto do 
magnésio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la striscia del 
metallo del magnesio che reagisce con il gas del cloro per preparare 
il cloruro del magnesio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει λουρίδα μετάλλων 
μαγνήσιου που αντιδρά με το χλώριο για να κάνει αέριο το 
χλωρίδιο μαγνήσιου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la tira del metal del 
magnesio que reacciona con el gas de la clorina para hacer el cloruro 
del magnesio.</string>
          </description>
